benefit: A simple, secure, and reliable way to incorporate your startup.
description: Stripe Atlas helps entrepreneurs start an internet business anywhere in the world. It provides a C Corporation in Delaware, an EIN from the IRS, a U.S. business bank account, and a Stripe account to accept payments.

benefit: Securely share your pitch deck and track investor engagement.
description: DocSend allows you to securely share documents with a link, get real-time feedback, and control who has access. It's essential for fundraising, sales, and business development.

benefit: The all-in-one workspace for your notes, tasks, wikis, and databases.
description: Notion blends your everyday work apps into one. It's the all-in-one workspace for you and your team, perfect for managing projects, creating a company wiki, and keeping everything organized.

benefit: The easiest way for startups to get legal paperwork done safely.
description: Clerky is designed specifically for startups and their attorneys to get legal paperwork done safely and easily. They help with incorporation, fundraising, hiring, and more.

benefit: An all-in-one platform for payroll, benefits, and HR for modern teams.
description: Gusto is a modern, online HR and payroll that helps small businesses take care of their teams. Onboard, pay, insure, and support your hardworking team.
